entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 12.
